source:
## This note book contains data transformations using Python (PySpark)

This notebook should not be run on its own, rather it is run as part of the Transforms_Connector notebook

from pyspark.sql.functions import when, col, sum, percent_rank 
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
import databricks.koalas as ks

sourcep = oea.stage2p
source3p = oea.stage3p

# source tables from Stage2
DMPersonDemographic_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/student/DMPersonDemographic_pseudo", format='delta')

# source tables from Stage3
EarlyYearsResults_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/EarlyYearsResults_pseudo", format='delta')
#### Split the DMPersonDemographic into DMStudentDemographic and DMStaffDemographic

# Clean up the table and remove null and unnecessary columns

df = DMPersonDemographic_df.filter(DMPersonDemographic_df.Ceider != -1) \
                .drop("UsualTransport") \
                .drop("ContactNotesBH") \
                .drop("ContactNotesAH") \
                .drop("OrganisationUserId") \
                .drop("ProgramCode") \
                .drop("Disability_YN") \
                .drop("DisabilityFundedInt") \
                .drop("ReceivesESL_YN") \
                .drop("ReceivesESLInt") \
                .drop("RequiresESL_YN") \
                .drop("RequresESLInt") \
                .drop("LBOTE_YN") \
                .drop("LBOTEInt") \
                .drop("AccessRestrictions_YN")

cleaned_df = df.withColumn("ATSIId", when(df.ATSIId > 4, 4).when(df.ATSIId < 1, 4).otherwise(df.ATSIId))

# now split the demographic information into two tables 
DMStudentDemographic_df = cleaned_df.filter((cleaned_df.PersonType == "Student"))
DMStaffDemographic_df = cleaned_df.filter((cleaned_df.PersonType == "Staff"))

# Create the early years transformations for aggregate pre/post rest results

EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df = EarlyYearsResults_df.groupBy("CampusID", "Ceider",	"ClassID", "Year", "YearLevel", "TestLevel").agg(sum(EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques1+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques2+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques3+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques4+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques5+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques6+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques7+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques8+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques9+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques10+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques11+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques12+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques13+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques14+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques15+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques16+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques17+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques18+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques19+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques20).alias("NumericTotal"), 
                                                                                                                sum(EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques21+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques22+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques23+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques24+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques25+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques26+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques27+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques28+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques29+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques30+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques31+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques32+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques33+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques34+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques35+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques36+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques37+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques38+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques39+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques40).alias("LiteracyTotal"))


EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df.withColumn("Numeracy Percentile", percent_rank().over(Window.orderBy("NumericTotal")))

EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df.withColumn("Literacy Percentile", percent_rank().over(Window.orderBy("LiteracyTotal")))

# this table will pivot the early years result Questions from columns to rows 

df = EarlyYearsResults_df.to_koalas().melt(id_vars=['CampusID', 'Ceider', 'ClassID', 'Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel'],
                                            value_vars=['Ques1', 'Ques2', 'Ques3', 'Ques4', 'Ques5', 'Ques6', 'Ques7', 'Ques8', 'Ques9', 'Ques10',
                                                        'Ques11', 'Ques12', 'Ques13', 'Ques14', 'Ques15', 'Ques16', 'Ques17', 'Ques18', 'Ques19', 'Ques20',
                                                        'Ques21', 'Ques22', 'Ques23', 'Ques24', 'Ques25', 'Ques26', 'Ques27', 'Ques28', 'Ques29', 'Ques30',
                                                        'Ques31', 'Ques32', 'Ques33', 'Ques34', 'Ques35', 'Ques36', 'Ques37', 'Ques38', 'Ques39', 'Ques40'],
                                            var_name="Question",
                                            value_name = "Result")

EarlyYearsResultsLong_df = df.to_spark()

saveToTarget(DMStudentDemographic_df, destination_p, f'{version}/DMStudentDemographic_pseudo')
saveToTarget(DMStaffDemographic_df, destination_p, f'{version}/DMStaffDemographic_pseudo')
saveToTarget(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df, destination_p, f'{version}/EarlyYearsResultsTotals_pseudo')
saveToTarget(EarlyYearsResultsLong_df, destination_p, f'{version}/EarlyYearsResultsLong_pseudo')
